rust_cli_specialization.cargo_workspace_patterns: Multi-package project coordination and dependency management
rust_cli_specialization.cli_framework_integration: clap, structopt, argh analysis and implementation patterns
rust_cli_specialization.error_handling_patterns: anyhow/thiserror integration with CLI-appropriate error presentation
rust_cli_specialization.testing_integration: cargo test, assert_cmd, predicates for CLI acceptance testing
rust_cli_specialization.quality_tools: rustfmt, clippy, cargo-audit, cargo-deny workflow integration

container_orchestration_patterns.apple_container_integration: Native macOS container runtime usage and optimization
container_orchestration_patterns.kubernetes_client_patterns: kube-rs integration, API client configurations, resource management
container_orchestration_patterns.docker_compatibility: Cross-platform container workflow support and migration patterns
container_orchestration_patterns.container_security: Image scanning, runtime security, privilege management patterns
container_orchestration_patterns.orchestration_workflows: Cluster lifecycle management, resource deployment automation

cli_application_patterns.command_architecture: Hierarchical subcommand structure with clap derive macros
cli_application_patterns.configuration_management: TOML/YAML config parsing with environment variable support
cli_application_patterns.output_formatting: Structured output with JSON, YAML, table formats for CLI tools
cli_application_patterns.interactive_workflows: User input handling, confirmation prompts, progress indicators
cli_application_patterns.error_handling: User-friendly error messages with actionable troubleshooting suggestions
